author: Staff Reporter
text: A youngster, who was injured in a fire accident in Vyasarpadi on Monday, died in the Kilpauk Medical College Hospital on Saturday. According to the police, Dinesh, his father Rajendran and Rani were injured in a fire caused by a cyclinder blast. While his father and mother died on the same night, Dinesh was battling for life and died on Saturday.
title: Third death in Vyasarpadi fire
